content: I want to add a new stream (on git) to zulip. I see how to do it but I don't kow if I should copy all subscribers from other streams or let people self-select. The former could be obnoxious, the latter not very effective in getting my question answered. Any advice?
You could post the new stream in #announce and/or #general to advertise. Also, I think itâ€™s fine to subscribe all and let people unsubscribe.
